title: Trump Thinks Deal to End Shutdown Is 'Pretty Close'
description: President Donald Trump says he thinks a deal to end the partial government shutdown is "pretty close." He speaks in the Oval Office. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Donald Trump says he thinks a deal to end the partial government shutdown is "pretty close." He speaks in the Oval Office. (Source: Bloomberg)
